original_text: And he called them unto him, and said unto them in parables, How can Satan cast out Satan?
korean_text: 예수께서 그들을 불러다가 비유로 말씀하시되 사탄이 어찌 사탄을 쫓아낼 수 있느냐

sentences.original_text: And he called them unto him
and said unto them in parables
How can Satan cast out Satan?
sentences.korean_translation: 사탄이 어찌 사탄을 쫓아낼 수 있으랴
